item.title: Chad Niederhuth
item.description: Assistant Professor Contact: niederhu@msu.edu Publications 2017 Bewick A. J., C. E. Niederhuth, L. Ji, N. A. Rohr, P. T. Griffin, J. Leebens-Mack, R. J. Schmitz (2017) The evolution of CHROMOMETHYLASES and gene body DNA methylation in plants. Genome Biol 18(1):65. Niederhuth C. E., R. J. Schmitz (2017) Putting DNA methylation in context: from genomes to gene expression in plants. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1860(1): 149-56. 2016 Niederhuth C. E., A. J.
